Introduction
This topic contains information on PFOP accounts, including
PFOP under regional office (RO) control
deaths on or after December 1, 1959, for PFOPs
, and
non-VA funds in a PFOP account
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
